description: This sandwich is piled high with classic deli fillings, contrasting sweet,sour, and salty flavours.
name: Deli-style Reuben Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 tbs sauerkraut, or from a jar

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, horseradish, tomato ketchup, and Worcestershire sauce. Season well.
Spread the dressing over each slice of bread. Layer 4 slices of bread with 2 slices of cheese, 3-5 slices of beef, sauerkraut, and 2 more slices of cheese. Top with the remaining slices of bread.

Melt a knob of butter in a frying pan over a medium heat. Fry each sandwich for 1-2 minutes on each side, or until golden brown. Serve your Reuben hot with Refrigerator pickles and kettle-cooked potato chips.
